summary:
𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 | 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 | 𝐎𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐬𝐞𝐝

Three words that best describe me.

Thank you for visiting my LinkedIn profile. My name is Niels Driessen, I am 22-years-old, and I live in the Netherlands.

In June 2022 I graduated in the Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) International Business. During this 4-year-long study I have learned a lot about Marketing & Sales, Management, Finance, Human Resources, and Supply Chain & Operations. During my two internships, it became clear that Marketing fits me best. Especially, Social Media Marketing.

At the moment, I would like to focus on finding a job within Marketing and develop myself in Marketing & Sales.

My future plans are to keep on developing myself, professionally, but also on personal level. As I like to learn languages, I would like to expand my knowledge of languages by first developing my Spanish and German level, and after that I would like to learn more languages. Next to learning languages, I would like to expand my knowledge by learning about the courses within my studies, but also about other topics that interest me.

If you have any questions, or you would like to speak with me, send me a message, mail, or text!

certifications.name: Bachelor of Business Administration, BBA - International Business
Become an Entrepreneur Inside a Company

projects.title: Lead generation via social media
projects.description: Graduation thesis on how e-llis Supply Chain Solutions can generate new leads by implementing its new branding strategy on social media. The main research question was: What actions can e-llis Supply Chain Solutions take in order to generate leads by 20% in comparison to 2021 by using its new branding strategy on social media by the end of 2022?

projects.description: Strategic review of a company is a school project in which we as a team strategically review Garmin Ltd.

contributors.headline: Junior Space Manager and Store Planning at Douglas

projects.title: LinkedIn engagement in the United Kingdom
projects.description: This research was conducted during my internship at Bundeling. The research answered the question: How can Bundeling use marketing on LinkedIn to build brand awareness and engage with prospects and customers in the United Kingdom? This was done by using multiple models and theories.
